title: Designing Library Educational Materials to Strengthen Global Inclusivity

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening access to global and multicultural information resources required for mathematical research and learning

learning_goals: Learners can effectively select and utilize library resources that consider diverse cultural backgrounds
Learners can propose strategies for revising educational materials that apply global DEI (Diversity, Equity, Inclusion) principles
Learners develop inclusive information literacy practice strategies through collaborative projects in blended environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
